translation.auto_forward_time_description: Choose the time in seconds before the dialogue auto-forwards.
translation.theme_mode_description: Choose between light, dark, or system theme mode.
translation.primary_color_description: Choose the primary color for the theme.
translation.solid_color_description: Choose the solid color for the theme. It can be black or white and will be contrasting with the primary color. So if the primary color is dark, the solid color will be white, and a the other way around.
translation.you_sure_to_return_main_menu: Are you sure you want to return to the main menu? All unsaved progress will be lost.
translation.you_sure_to_quick_load: Are you sure you want to load the quick save? All unsaved progress will be lost.
translation.text_speed_description: Choose the speed of the text.
